desc: Discover Huntley Equestrian's fine equestrian tack and accessories along with the children's line, Daisy Clipper, that offers great products for young riders. Browse the beautiful collection of horse tack, half chaps, paddock boots, horse bridles, equestrian backpacks, stirrup leathers, riding crops and more.

layout.text: The Classic Look with A Custom Fit
Get a custom fit along with flexibility and stability.
